name: The Infinite Office
description:
-The Infinite Office-

- You wake up in the middle of your night shift... Something doesn't feel right... Something doesn't feel right about you... Something doesn't feel right about the place... Is this a dream?... Is this even reality?... How long have you been here? How long have you been working for?... You wander through the office as the office starts to seem getting bigger and bigger in each step you take. 

This game has a total of 6 endings...

-Credits and Shout outs-

Credits to Jimmy D. Journey - for Character and animations: https://jimmydjourney.itch.io

Shout out to my friend Mintyfield:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdsRC8W9AgRxbwaFTMhcyyQ

This game is made with Flowlab: https://flowlab.io/
